=== Plugin Name ===
Contributors: cmwslw, travistruett
Tags: Fireplug, Get Credit, Text-Analysis, Auto-Tagging, User Experience
Requires at least: 3.0.1
Tested up to: 3.5.1
Stable tag: 0.1.2
License: GPLv2 or later
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

The Official Wordpress Fireplug-in. Allow your readers to get credit for visiting your website and reading your content.

== Description ==

* Get Credit button pops-up an interface detailing the credit just earned.
* [In Works] Get Credit button can trigger auto-generated quiz for additional interaction.
* [Planned] Auto-tag articles with credit that can be earned.
* Simple, one-minute installation.

== Installation ==

1. Click the Plugins Tab on the left side of your Wordpress Admin.
2. Click *Add New*, search for *Fireplug* and click *Install*.
3. Click back on the Plugins Tab and in the right pane look for Fireplug-in.
4. Click *Activate*.
5. Send any thoughts/ideas to feedback@getfireplug.com.

== Screenshots ==

1. Get Credit button on article.
2. Zoomed in Get Credit button.
3. Fireplug-in on the Plugin settings page.
